data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

(Lisa)\\\\\\\"},\\\\\\\"createdAt\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"2026-02-24T20:15:32.249Z\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"updatedAt\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"2026-02-24T20:15:32.249Z\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"deletedAt\\\\\\\":null,\\\\\\\"createdBy\\\\\\\":null,\\\\\\\"updatedBy\\\\\\\":null,\\\\\\\"deletedBy\\\\\\\":null},\\\\\\\"definition\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"id\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"saga_definition_3A7asUu1scoXdknwwe7LjhI6mHJ\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"bizId\\\\\\\":null,\\\\\\\"sagaKey\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"uc-168-the-front-desk-manager-lisa\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"UC-168  The Take-A-Number Queue with Digital Display  The Front Desk Manager (Lisa)\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"description\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Comprehensive lifecycle saga derived from UC-168 and persona P-3. Needs summary: Ticket number generation (sequential, per-queue or global); Multi-counter/window support (A1-A99, B1-B99 for different service types); Digital display screen showing: current number being served, next numbers up, estimated wait time; Customer-facing ticket with: their number, estimated wait, position in line, QR code for status tracking; SMS/app notifications when number approaching (\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"You're 3 away\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"); \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Now Serving\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" audio announcement integration; Estimated wait time calculation based on: average service time per counter, numbers ahead, current queue depth; Service type routing (Counter A for simple tasks, Counter B for complex); Recall number if customer missed (hold for X minutes, then skip); Transfer number between queues (complex case needs different counter); Virtual queue option (take number remotely, arrive when close); Walk-away tolerance (bathroom, shopping) with position hold; Analytics: average wait time, peak hours, service time by counter, abandoned numbers\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"status\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"active\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"sourceUseCaseRef\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"UC-168\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"sourcePersonaRef\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"P-3\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"sourceUseCaseFile\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"/Users/ameer/bizing/mind/workspace/documentation/use-cases-comprehensive.md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"sourcePersonaFile\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"/Users/ameer/bizing/mind/workspace/documentation/tester-personas.md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"specVersion\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"saga.v0\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"specFilePath\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"testing/sagas/specs/uc-168-the-front-desk-manager-lisa.json\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"specChecksum\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"d2add6651a79258a30d3ef6df9b3bcd0b5fd841050d4ff7f955e62f486d19e8d\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"metadata\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"tags\\\\\\\":[\\\\\\\"uc-derived\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"persona-derived\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"lifecycle\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"api-first\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"agents\\\\\\\"],\\\\\\\"generatedAt\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"2026-02-24T20:12:26.473Z\\\\\\\"},\\\\\\\"createdAt\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"2026-02-24T15:17:49.034Z\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"updatedAt\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"2026-02-24T15:17:49.034Z\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"deletedAt\\\\\\\":null,\\\\\\\"createdBy\\\\\\\":null,\\\\\\\"updatedBy\\\\\\\":null,\\\\\\\"deletedBy\\\\\\\":null},\\\\\\\"spec\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"schemaVersion\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"saga.v0\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"sagaKey\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"uc-168-the-front-desk-manager-lisa\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"UC-168  The Take-A-Number Queue with Digital Display  The Front Desk Manager (Lisa)\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"description\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Comprehensive lifecycle saga derived from UC-168 and persona P-3. Needs summary: Ticket number generation (sequential, per-queue or global); Multi-counter/window support (A1-A99, B1-B99 for different service types); Digital display screen showing: current number being served, next numbers up, estimated wait time; Customer-facing ticket with: their number, estimated wait, position in line, QR code for status tracking; SMS/app notifications when number approaching (\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"You're 3 away\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"); \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Now Serving\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" audio announcement integration; Estimated wait time calculation based on: average service time per counter, numbers ahead, current queue depth; Service type routing (Counter A for simple tasks, Counter B for complex); Recall number if customer missed (hold for X minutes, then skip); Transfer number between queues (complex case needs different counter); Virtual queue option (take number remotely, arrive when close); Walk-away tolerance (bathroom, shopping) with position hold; Analytics: average wait time, peak hours, service time by counter, abandoned numbers\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"tags\\\\\\\":[\\\\\\\"uc-derived\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"persona-derived\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"lifecycle\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"api-first\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"agents\\\\\\\"],\\\\\\\"defaults\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"runMode\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"dry_run\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"continueOnFailure\\\\\\\":false},\\\\\\\"source\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"useCaseRef\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"UC-168\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"personaRef\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"P-3\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"useCaseFile\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"/Users/ameer/bizing/mind/workspace/documentation/use-cases-comprehensive.md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"personaFile\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"/Users/ameer/bizing/mind/workspace/documentation/tester-personas.md\\
